Description: Fragment of round handle at neck join of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Visellius. See Desy, Ph., Les timbres amphoriques de l'Apulie republicaine (Oxford 1989) 146.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (339)
